purpose.title: Purpose
purpose.description: A friendly exercise challenge among friends designed to promote healthy and consistent physical activity, strengthen connections across borders (this is an international challenge!), and nurture friendship throughout the process.
purpose.highlight: The main goal is not just to compete, but to maintain discipline, health, and consistency, supported by a spirit of mutual encouragement.

general.title: General Rules
rules: Each valid exercise session equals 1 point
Only 1 point per day maximum (with exceptions below)
The challenge is based on honesty, good faith, and personal responsibility
Evidence of exercise is required for points to count
